A **Workshop on Time Series Analysis** for official  will be held at OECD, Paris, La Muette, France on **December 3rd and 4th 2025**.

Abstract submission is open and will close on September 15th 2025.

Details [here](Call_for_Papers_OECD_3_4_Dec2025.pdf).
